Package org.jacktheclipper.frontend.authentication

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackendAuthenticationProvider
    Authenticates users with the backend.
    CustomAuthenticationFailureHandler
    Handles authentication failures as the name implies.
    CustomAuthenticationFilter
    A filter to produce a custom authentication token, so users can be identified with additional fields from the login form and not just their email and password
    CustomAuthenticationSuccessHandler
    Handles successful authentication as the name implies.
    CustomAuthenticationToken
    A custom Token holding information from the login form, which in this case is a username, a password and the name of an organization.
    CustomLogoutHandler
    Handles the logout events of the Jack the Clipper application.
    OrganizationGuard
    A class concerned with giving/ denying user's access to parts of the Jack the Clipper application.
    User
    This class represents a user for this application.
